segments.text: I am furious at how careless the boy is being right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall and hurt himself, and he doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water is everywhere, and she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for cookies, not helping at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being selfish, risking everything for a few cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is about to tip, and he’s still reaching like an idiot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman’s foot in the water, and it’s just making me mad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is infuriating, and I wish someone would step in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the cookie jar is almost empty, and it’s not even worth the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to teach these kids some responsibility.
segments.speaker: PAR
